title: Better Than A Gun In A Knife Fight...
description: Authored by A. Razor, A. RazorIntroduction by Bucky SinisterCover design or artwork by Geoff MelvilleEdited by Iris BerryA Collection Of Prose and Poetry from A. Razor, who has published and written and shared his work on the road and from inside prison for many years, now here is the writer's work in one book that presents many styles and influences all worked out with a genuine love that has driven a lifetime struggle for peace among the words of this world.
author: A. Razor
